name: San Mateo County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for San Mateo County residents
fullDescription: The Housing Authority of San Mateo County administers Section 8 vouchers and affordable housing programs for low-income residents throughout San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Rapid rehousing programs
- Family self-sufficiency program
howToGetIt:
1. Check HACSM website for waitlist openings
2. Apply during open enrollment period
3. Must meet income limits
4. San Mateo County residents get preference
5. Wait for lottery selection
address: 264 Harbor Boulevard, Building A, Belmont, CA 94002
keywords: San Mateo Housing Authority, SMCHA, Section 8, housing voucher, Peninsula, low-income, waitlist, Redwood City
